# shoppingwords

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of shoppingwords is to provide several datasets useful for processing and analysis of text in Turkish from an online shopping platform.

## Installation

You can install the development version of shoppingwords from [GitHub](https://github.com/bkanx/shoppingwords) with:

```{r}
#| eval: false
pak::pak("bkanx/shoppingwords")
```

Or install it from CRAN via:

```{r}
#| eval: false
install.packages("shoppingwords")
```

See the vignette for more information on how you can use this package.
